meanings.definition: To stimulate one's own genitals for sexual pleasure.
meanings.sent1: He masturbates every night before going to sleep.
meanings.sent2: She often masturbates when she is alone.
meanings.sent3: The cat looks like it masturbates when it cleans itself too much.
meanings.sent4: The engine of the car seems to masturbate as it revs up.
meanings.sent5: The tree branches seem to masturbate in the wind, swaying sensually.

meanings.definition: To engage in self-stimulation of the genitals.
meanings.sent1: John masturbates in private to relax after a long day.
meanings.sent2: Lisa discovered that her roommate masturbates regularly.
meanings.sent3: The robot malfunctioned and started to masturbate uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The river seems to masturbate as it flows swiftly downstream.
meanings.sent5: The wind turbine appears to masturbate as it spins in the breeze.
